item.title: About
item.description: I am a financial systems leader and Certified Public Accountant in Nashville’s healthcare industry. My current role is Head of Financial Business Systems at Lyra Health, a global EAP with operations on six continents. During my time, Lyra has expanded from a US-only business to an international business with a worldwide network of subsidiaries. My team has implemented Coupa, Zuora, Avalara, and numerous NetSuite modules as the business has scaled. We support several layers of multi-currency consolidation in both GAAP and IFRS as well as global tax reporting.

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Specialties Link to heading

  • ERP / SaaS business systems strategy & execution
  • Leading distributed and remote global business systems teams
  • Global multi-currency and multi-book consolidation & reporting
  • Quote-to-Cash (Q2C), usage-based billing, subscription/consumption models
  • Medical billing and healthcare industry revenue cycle
  • Implementation & optimization of key platforms: NetSuite, Zuora Billing, Coupa, Ramp, Workato
  • Systems governance, integration architecture, data flows & controls (SOX/compliance readiness)

Experience Link to heading

Lyra Health - Burlingame, CA (Remote) Link to heading
